name: Gavel of Infinite Wisdom
tooltip:
Gavel of Infinite WisdomLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Ornate Hilt, 2  Lambent Idols, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Ornate Hilt
- Lambent Idol x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
